review.title: “Engineer”
review.pros: Pros – Family atmosphere with great engineers at the lower levels. Work schedule is flexible.
review.cons: Cons – The upper management is corrupt with office politics which results in promotions and/or raises and opportunities are pre-determined before anyone knows your abilities. If you're on the right side of that equation you'll like your job, if you are not within that pre-determined group you will not like the position and soon be looking for other employment due to lack of growth within the company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Promote from within and promote based on merit instead of personal relationship.
